tournament.name: Thunderdome Thursday - March 2025
tournament.description:
An all skill level inclusive event for any fan of Killer Queen, or people who are new to the game.
We'll be forming teams on location starting between 7:30-8 PM (Get here early if you can!).
If you will be here at or after 8 PM, please let Chris know so we can get your name on the roster beforehand. This helps us start to form teams so we're not starting the tournament too late.
This is a monthly Killer Queen Tournament that takes place every fourth Thursday.
Just a reminder we are 21 & up after 9 PM, but if your team is still playing, younger teammates are allowed to stay.
Have any questions? Message Free Play Denton or Chris Delp.
Bonus ~ it's 40% off all drafts.
Can't wait to tap with everyone!
tournament.registration_message: Register for free, just click through any payment options.  This will track your tournament stats as well as let you dictate exactly how you are called to the cab by the overlay.
